name: Alchemy from Nothing
description:
The philosopher's stone ...

Have you ever heard of it ?

Capable of turning base metals such as mercury into gold or silver. It is also called the elixir of life, useful for rejuvenation and for achieving immortality.

Do I have your attention now ?

And wait, the best part is that you can create it from nothing...

You will only need to give some of yourself in this project.

This game is entirely made in 48 hours in solo, i really enjoyed this jam.
In this game, you will only have to combine ingredients to finally reach the philosopher's stone.
To help you to find the working combination, you can check this book :

Click on the alchemist to drain his blood, and start from it to reach enough blood to synthesize the philosopher's stone.

Control :
All the game is only playable with your mouse, the only key usefull will be SPACE to put the game in pause.

- Solnak
